definition: Devices designed for entertainment, exercise, or leisure activities that people use for fun or fitness.

positive_examples: She spent an hour on the treadmill at the gym this morning.
The kids are playing video games on their gaming console.
He lifted weights using the barbell in his home gym.
They watched a movie on their smart TV last night.
The exercise bike helped her stay in shape during winter.
The family enjoyed playing music on their stereo system.
negative_examples: The dishwasher finished cleaning all the dinner plates.
She used a hair dryer to style her hair before work.
The mechanic repaired the car engine with specialized tools.
The surgeon used medical equipment during the operation.
He programmed the thermostat to regulate room temperature.
The construction worker operated heavy machinery at the site.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: KitchenAppliance, MedicalDevice, CommunicationDevice, SecurityDevice
